channel.title: How do i create a quest
channel.description:
okay im woundering how i make a quest i need smart people to anwser and not newcommers no offensive okay heres the deal
im working on a server its all done and everything but before i release it i want to know how tomake a quest also i would like to know these additional details:
1)how to add a npc that you cannot attack and that will not disapper tell i delete it 2)how to make this npc talk 3)how to make it give you a choice like (do you want to teleport to god wars yes or no) and if you click yes it teleports you there if no it wont
please help me
